summary.span: 命名空間 (Namespace) 含有支援並處理通道和通道接收的類別，這些通道和通道接收會在用戶端呼叫遠端物件的方法時做為傳輸媒介。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that support and handle channels and channel sinks, which are used as the transport medium when a client calls a method on a remote object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道是在跨遠端界限的應用程式之間 (不論是應用程式定義域、處理序或電腦之間) 傳輸訊息的物件。Channels are objects that transport messages between applications across remoting boundaries, whether between application domains, processes, or computers. 通道可以在傳入訊息的端點上接聽、傳送傳出訊息至另一個端點，或兩者皆可。A channel can listen on an endpoint for inbound messages, send outbound messages to another endpoint, or both. 這讓您能夠外掛範圍廣泛的通訊協定，即使在通道的另一端沒有 Common Language Runtime 也沒關係。This enables you to plug in a wide range of protocols, even if the common language runtime is not at the other end of the channel. 通道傳送一連串的通道接收物件之前傳送或接收訊息之後沿著每個物件。Channels send each object along a chain of channel sink objects prior to sending or after receiving a message. 這個接收鏈結包含所需的基本通道功能，例如傳輸或堆疊產生器接收的接收，但您可以自訂通道接收鏈結來執行處理訊息或資料流的特殊工作。This sink chain contains sinks required for basic channel functionality, such as transport or stack builder sinks, but you can customize the channel sink chain to perform special tasks with a message or a stream. 每個鏈結中每個接收接收物件、 執行特定作業，並將它傳遞到下一個接收鏈結中。Each sink in each chain receives the object, performs a specific operation, and passes it on to the next sink in the chain. 沒有任何規則，接收的訊息接收的確切物件必須傳遞至下一個接收，但通常就會發生的情況。There is no rule that the exact object received by a message sink must be passed on to the next sink, though this will often be the case. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 頻道](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6e9b60e0-9bc0-47b4-a8ef-3b78585f9a18)並[接收與接收鏈結](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/516aaab7-5b3d-4c72-83dd-d435c01af8f6)。For more information, see [Channels](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6e9b60e0-9bc0-47b4-a8ef-3b78585f9a18) and [Sinks and Sink Chains](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/516aaab7-5b3d-4c72-83dd-d435c01af8f6).
